reference.title: learningObjectMap
reference.shortdesc: Use a learningObjectMap to create standalone aggregations of learningContent together with its supporting plan, overview, summary, and assessments, according to the needs identified by the learning goals and objectives.

section.title: Description and Semantics
section.p: The learningObjectMap is a map specialization which supports the DITA Learning and Training Map domain. It is used to aggregate learningContent, together with its supporting files and assessments, into a single standalone map type.
